languages.text: "Мы посеяли лишь скверну! Схизму! Вспомни, как они пришли низложить нас — мы дали отпор и уничтожили этот корабль! Священную реликвию! Механический ковчег, что старше самой нашей церкви! В этой зале мы освободили Эсхатос и дали свершиться запредельному святотатству! Ты помнишь? Помнишь, как получил свою раздвоенную челюсть?!"

"All we did was breed corruption! Schism! Remember when they came to depose us? We resisted them and destroyed this ship! A sacred relic! An Ark Mechanicus older than our priesthood itself! Here in this hall, we released Eschatos and allowed an unconscionable heresy to happen! Do you remember? Do you remember how you got your cleft jaw?"
languages.original_text: "Мы посеяли лишь скверну! Схизму! Вспомни, как они пришли низложить нас — мы дали отпор и уничтожили этот корабль! Священную реликвию! Механический ковчег, что старше самой нашей церкви! В этой зале мы освободили Эсхатос и дали свершиться запредельному святотатству! Ты помнишь? Помнишь, как получил свою раздвоенную челюсть?!"

traits.locale_text: "All we did was to breed corruption! A schism! Remember when they came to depose us? We resisted them and destroyed this ship! A sacred relic! An Ark Mechanicus that is older than our church itself! Here in this hall, we released Eschatos and allowed an unconscionable sacrilege to happen! Do you remember? Do you remember how you got your cleft jaw?"
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

traits.locale_text: "All we did was to breed corruption! A schism! Remember when they came to depose us? We resisted them and destroyed this ship! A sacred relic! An Ark Mechanicus that is older than our church itself! Here in this hall, we released Eschatos and allowed an unconscionable sacrilege to happen! Do you remember? Do you remember how you got your cleft jaw?"

An Ark Mechanicus older than our priesthood itself! Here in this hall, we released Eschatos and allowed an unconscionable heresy to happen! Do you remember? An Ark Mechanicus older than our priesthood itself! Here in this hall, we released Eschatos and allowed an unconscionable heresy to happen! Do you remember? Do you remember how you got your cleft jaw?"
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: 「私たちの行いは堕落を重ねただけだった！分離派を生んだ！カルカサル軍が私たちを追放しにやってきたことを覚えているか？私たちは奴らに抵抗し、この船を破壊した！聖遺物であるこの船を！教会より長い歴史のあるアーク・メカニカスを！ここはその広間、私たちがエスカトを開放し、外道な異端行為に励んだ場所だ！思い出したか？そのあごが裂けるハメになった理由を覚えているか？」
languages.original_text: "All we did was breed corruption! Schism! Remember when they came to depose us? We resisted them and destroyed this ship! A sacred relic! An Ark Mechanicus older than our priesthood itself! Here in this hall, we released Eschatos and allowed an unconscionable heresy to happen! Do you remember? Do you remember how you got your cleft jaw?"

traits.locale_text: 「私たちの行いは堕落を重ねただけだった！分離派を生んだ！カルカサル軍が私たちを追放しにやってきたことを覚えているか？私たちは奴らに抵抗し、この船を破壊した！聖遺物であるこの船を！教会より長い歴史のあるアーク・メカニカスを！ここはその広間、私たちがエスカトを開放し、外道な異端行為に励んだ場所だ！思い出したか？そのあごが裂けるハメになった理由を覚えているか？」
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: “我们所做的一切只滋生了腐化！还有分裂！还记得他们来推翻我们的时候吗？我们奋起反抗，最终摧毁了这艘飞船！这件神圣的遗物！这艘比我们的修会还要古老的机械方舟！在这个大厅里，我们释放了终焉审判，犯下了毫无底线的异端罪行！你还记得吗？你还记得你的下颚是怎么断裂的吗？”
languages.original_text: "All we did was breed corruption! Schism! Remember when they came to depose us? We resisted them and destroyed this ship! A sacred relic! An Ark Mechanicus older than our priesthood itself! Here in this hall, we released Eschatos and allowed an unconscionable heresy to happen! Do you remember? Do you remember how you got your cleft jaw?"

traits.locale_text: “我们所做的一切只滋生了腐化！还有分裂！还记得他们来推翻我们的时候吗？我们奋起反抗，最终摧毁了这艘飞船！这件神圣的遗物！这艘比我们的教堂还要古老的机械方舟！在这个大厅里，我们释放了终焉审判，犯下了毫无底线的异端罪行！你还记得吗？你还记得你的下颚是怎么断裂的吗？”
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: « Nous n'avons fait qu'apporter la corruption ! Le schisme ! Vous souvenez-vous de ce qui s'est passé lorsqu'ils sont venus nous destituer ? Nous avons résisté, et nous avons détruit ce vaisseau ! Une relique sacrée ! Une Arche Mechanicus plus ancienne que le clergé lui-même ! Ici même, nous avons libéré Eschatos et laissé une hérésie des plus impardonnables se produire ! L'auriez-vous oublié ? Auriez-vous oublié comment vous avez écopé de cette blessure ? »
languages.original_text: "All we did was breed corruption! Schism! Remember when they came to depose us? We resisted them and destroyed this ship! A sacred relic! An Ark Mechanicus older than our priesthood itself! Here in this hall, we released Eschatos and allowed an unconscionable heresy to happen! Do you remember? Do you remember how you got your cleft jaw?"

traits.locale_text: « Nous n'avons fait qu'apporter la corruption ! Le schisme ! Vous souvenez-vous de ce qui s'est passé lorsqu'ils sont venus nous destituer ? Nous avons résisté, et nous avons détruit ce vaisseau ! Une relique sacrée ! Une Arche Mechanicus plus ancienne que l'église elle-même ! Ici même, nous avons libéré Eschatos et laissé une hérésie des plus impardonnables se produire ! L'auriez-vous oublié ? Auriez-vous oublié comment vous avez écopé de cette blessure ? »
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: «¡No hicimos más que desatar la corrupción! ¡Nos dividimos! ¿Recuerda cuando vinieron a deponernos? ¡Nos resistimos y destruimos esta nave, una reliquia sagrada! ¡Un arca del Mechanicus más antigua que el propio sacerdocio! ¡Aquí, en esta sala, liberamos a Eschatos y permitimos que ocurriera un sacrilegio inconcebible! ¿Lo recuerda? ¿Recuerda cómo acabaste con la mandíbula hendida?».
languages.original_text: "All we did was breed corruption! Schism! Remember when they came to depose us? We resisted them and destroyed this ship! A sacred relic! An Ark Mechanicus older than our priesthood itself! Here in this hall, we released Eschatos and allowed an unconscionable heresy to happen! Do you remember? Do you remember how you got your cleft jaw?"

traits.locale_text: «¡No hicimos más que desatar la corrupción! ¡Nos dividimos! ¿Te acuerdas cuando vinieron a deponernos? ¡Nos resistimos y destruimos esta nave, una reliquia sagrada! ¡Un arca del Mechanicus más antigua que nuestra propia iglesia! ¡Aquí, en esta sala, liberamos a Eschatos y permitimos que ocurriera un sacrilegio inconcebible! ¿Te acuerdas? ¿Te acuerdas de cómo acabaste con la mandíbula hendida?».
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Wir haben nur Verderbnis erzeugt! Spaltung! Erinnert Ihr Euch, wie sie gekommen sind, uns zu entsorgen? Wir haben uns widersetzt und dieses Schiff zerstört! Ein heiliges Relikt! Eine Mechanicus-Arche älter als unsere Priesterschaft selbst! Hier in dieser Halle haben wir Eschatos losgelassen und eine unerhörte Ketzerei geschehen lassen! Erinnert Ihr Euch? Erinnert Ihr Euch, wie Euer Kiefer gespalten wurde?"
languages.original_text: "All we did was breed corruption! Schism! Remember when they came to depose us? We resisted them and destroyed this ship! A sacred relic! An Ark Mechanicus older than our priesthood itself! Here in this hall, we released Eschatos and allowed an unconscionable heresy to happen! Do you remember? Do you remember how you got your cleft jaw?"

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben nur Verderbnis erzeugt! Spaltung! Erinnert Ihr Euch, wie sie gekommen sind, uns zu entsorgen? Wir haben uns widersetzt und dieses Schiff zerstört! Ein heiliges Relikt! Eine Mechanicus-Arche älter als unsere Kirche selbst! Hier in dieser Halle haben wir Eschatos losgelassen und eine unerhörte Ketzerei geschehen lassen! Erinnert Ihr Euch? Erinnert Ihr Euch, wie Euer Kiefer gespalten wurde?"
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Tek yaptığımız yozlaşmayı, bölünmeyi beslemekti! Bizi ortadan kaldırmaya geldikleri günü hatırlıyor musun? Onlara direndik, bu gemiyi yok ettik! Kutsal bir yadigârı! Rahipliğin kendisinden bile eski bir Ark Mechanicus'u! Tam burada Eskatos'u salıp vicdansız bir kâfirliğin vuku bulmasına izin verdik! Hatırlıyor musun? Çenenin nasıl çatladığını hatırlıyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "All we did was breed corruption! Schism! Remember when they came to depose us? We resisted them and destroyed this ship! A sacred relic! An Ark Mechanicus older than our priesthood itself! Here in this hall, we released Eschatos and allowed an unconscionable heresy to happen! Do you remember? Do you remember how you got your cleft jaw?"

traits.locale_text: "Tek yaptığımız yozlaşmayı beslemekti! Bölünmeydi! Bizi ortadan kaldırmaya geldikleri günü hatırlıyor musun? Onlara direndik ve bu gemiyi yok ettik! Kutsal bir yadigârı! Rahipliğin kendisinden bile eski bir Ark Mechanicus'u! Tam burada Eschatos'u saldık ve vicdansız bir kâfirliğin vuku bulmasına izin verdik! Hatırlıyor musun? Çenenin nasıl çatladığını hatırlıyor musun?"
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
